skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Angel of Disease
skillTree.description: "My bedfellows are pestilence, famine and war… but mainly pestilence."

effects.description:
Growth per region: +5 after winning a battle
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed of the Crow
skillTree.description: Blessed of the Crow have the innate power to transmogrify from human form to Spawn and back again at will, and often at the most opportune moments.

skillTree.name: Plague of Decay
skillTree.description: The spreading rot of the Urfather's blight ages and sours materials in moments, causing years of damage

ui_effects.description: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit

skillTree.name: Crowshield
skillTree.description: The patron diety of the Rotblood tribe has many gifts for those who are most devoted. Unending life is simply one of them.

skillTree.name: Unholy Constitution
skillTree.description: Those touched by the Crow oft lead long and healthy lives, even if it is not exactly in the form that they would desire

skillTree.name: Locus of Pestilence
skillTree.description: Clouds of green-tinged fumes spill forth from the rancid bodies of decay, spreading pestilence in their wake.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadeye
skillTree.description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Noxious Warriors
skillTree.description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Crow soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

effects.description:
Leadership: +3 for Rotblood Marauders and Rotblood Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Rotblood Marauders and Rotblood Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Rotblood Marauders and Rotblood Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +9 for Rotblood Marauders and Rotblood Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +20 for Rotblood Marauders and Rotblood Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Champions of the Rotblood
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description:
Physical Resist: +4% for Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resist: +8% for Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -25% for Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resist: +12% for Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pox Spreaders
skillTree.description: Mere distance is hardly enough to escape the hail of toxic weaponry the Rotblood Tribe can bring to bear

effects.description:
Ammunition: +5% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +5% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +10% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the Rotblood
skillTree.description: Giant, deadly, and able to take orders, this Lord’s monstrosities are especially terrifying and lethal.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +4 for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, and Toad King units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, and Toad King units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, and Toad King units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +8 for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, and Toad King units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12% for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, and Toad King units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bilious Winds
skillTree.description: Magic surrounds the Rotblood Tribe, infects their blood, and spews outward in a toxic mixture of death and pestilence

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +2 for Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Pestilence Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resist: +5% for Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Pestilence Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +5 for Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Pestilence Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resist: +10% for Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Pestilence Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +8 for Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Pestilence Engine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bile Packs
skillTree.description: Flee all you like, for the hunters of the Rotblood Tribe will bring you to heel

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call the Rotblood
skillTree.description: Blood calls to blood... and the plagues that infect even the lowliest member of the Rotblood tribe answers.

skillTree.name: Undying of the Crow
skillTree.description: No matter what rises against them, the Rotblood Tribe shall turn it aside and weather the storm

effects.description:
Magic Resist: +20% for Rotblood Marauders, Rotblood Spearmen, Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Large: +8 for Rotblood Marauders, Rotblood Spearmen, Rotblood Engorged, Rotblood Martyrs, and Rotblood Plaguespear units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reaching Toxicity
skillTree.description: Pox knows no bounds, and nor do the ranged combatants of the Rotblood Tribe

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +10% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Rotblood Grenadiers, Rotblood Vomitus, Rotblood Blightstormer, Rotblood Lifeleech, and Rotblood Plaguejavelins units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Resilient Giants
skillTree.description: Papa Nurgle gifts life to all who follow in his footsteps, and he has a special place in his heart for the unwanted of Norsca

effects.description:
Physical Resist: +15% for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, Pestilence Engine, and Toad King units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile Resist: +12% for Bile Trolls, Bile Giants, Giant Rot Flies, Rotblood Spawns, Pestilence Engine, and Toad King units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Slaughterpack
skillTree.description: Running simply brings the hounds coming quicker, for they sense the fear in their prey

effects.description:
Ward save: 10% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: 15% for Rotblood Horsemen, Rotblood Plague Chariot, and Rotblood Hounds units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call the Rotblood Upgraded
skillTree.description: Blood calls to blood... and the plagues that infect even the lowliest member of the Rotblood tribe answers.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Blessed by Blight
skillTree.description: Just as all life is born, so it must wither and die. Before that happens comes disease, in all its disgusting, filth-ridden glory.

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pestilential Spawnings
skillTree.description: Those corrupted by Nurgle's rot flock to his putrid banner in the hope that they will be reborn anew in Grandfather's image.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Infernal Dominance
backgroundSkills.description: "Mine desire is all, mortal wretch!"

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Misshapen
backgroundSkills.description: Deformed from birth or made so by the Ruinous Powers, yet there is honour within the prison of flesh.

backgroundSkills.name: Disfiguring Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Such an ugly scar is always memorable.

backgroundSkills.name: Distinguishing Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.

backgroundSkills.name: Stupid
backgroundSkills.description: Shares the intellect of a River Troll.

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
